sentences.en: A cool $500,000 is to be spent on obtaining genuine 17th-century air from the inside of, wait for it, an occupied lead coffin.
sentences.cn: 将花费整整50万美元获取货真价实的17世纪的空气，注意了，是从一个内有尸体的铅制棺材里获得。

sentences.en: A fine would be the final nail in the coffin of the airline.
sentences.cn: 罚款将会是对这家航空公司的最后致命一击。

sentences.en: Four soldiers kept guard over the coffin.
Four soldiers stood guard over the coffin.
My father's working bench was covered with a cloth and his coffin was laid there.
sentences.cn: 爸爸的工作台上盖了一块布，他的灵枢就陈放在那儿。

sentences.en: Peter could see the coffin amid the smoke.
sentences.cn: 彼得能看见烟雾中的棺材.

sentences.en: That that was the first problem. And then, that there was another: the empty coffin.
sentences.cn: 这是首先遇到的困难，还有一层困难，便是那口空棺材。

sentences.en: The coffin closed with a dull thud.
sentences.cn: 棺材合上时发出一声闷响。

sentences.en: The coffin had been draped in a Union Jack.
sentences.cn: 灵柩上覆盖着英国国旗。

sentences.en: The coffin lid had been screwed down.
The coffin was carried by six soldiers walking in lockstep .
sentences.cn: 灵柩由齐步行进的六名士兵抬着。

sentences.en: The coffin was placed in the grave.
sentences.cn: 那口棺材已安放到坟墓里去了.

sentences.en: The sight of the coffin sent a shudder through him.
sentences.cn: 看到那副棺材,他浑身一阵战栗.

sentences.en: They bore the coffin into the church.
Two reporters had to help lower the coffin into the grave.
sentences.cn: 两名记者不得不帮忙把灵柩慢慢地放进墓穴中。

sentences.en: When I die, I just need an ordinary coffin.
sentences.cn: 如果我死了，我只需要一个普通棺材。

sentences.en: When one's coffin is covered , all discussion about him can be settled.
When one's coffin is covered, all discussion about him can be settled.

trans.tran_en: a long box in which a dead person is buried or burnt
